description_zh: 經典的焦香風味，外層焦黑，內心卻保持著令人難以抗拒的綿密與濕潤口感。
description_en: The classic burnt top offers a deep caramelized flavor, contrasting the incredibly creamy and smooth center.

description_zh: 外層是焦糖化的深褐色酥殼，內部則是充滿香草與蘭姆酒香氣的柔軟 Q 彈糕體。
description_en: A dark, caramelized crispy crust gives way to a tender, custardy center flavored with vanilla and rum.
